item.title: horizontal scrolling tabs with plain HTML, JS, CSS
item.description: Preface #Not long ago, in one of my projects, I need to show a horizontal scrolling tab, which supports horizontal mouse drag and click to switch. In the process of realization, I found that this small feature needs to use the front-end of the three carriages at the same time, but the realization of the difficulty is not high, and the final result is not bad, is a rare beginner project, so the idea of writing this article was born, I hope that beginners can help.
